titleStmt.title: An Account of the taking of the island of Martinego, in the West-Indies, from the French by the English forces and fleet, commanded by Sir Francis Wheeler also of the taking of two French ships, one of 22 guns, the other of 20 guns, belonging to Martinego and Guardialoope : in a letter to a merchant in London.

notesStmt.note: At head of letter: Plymouth, June the 4th, 1693.
